title: Drowsiness Detection
description: Real-time computer vision system detects driver drowsiness using Haar cascade classifiers and OpenCV, triggering alarms if drowsiness is detected.

title: Multiple Face Recognition
description: A system which detects and recognizes multiple faces using OpenCV, and Convolution Neural Network.

title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
description: Credit Card Fraud Detection System using Random Forest model deployed on Kubernetes, ensuring robust fraud detection in a scalable environment.
